sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO md_sequences ( id , schema_id_fk , name , seq_start , incr , native_sql , native_key , comments , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #schemaIdFk# , #name# , #seqStart# , #incr# , #nativeSql# , #nativeKey# , #comments# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE md_sequences SET id = #id# , schema_id_fk = #schemaIdFk# , name = #name# , seq_start = #seqStart# , incr = #incr# , native_sql = #nativeSql# , native_key = #nativeKey# , comments = #comments# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM md_sequences WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , schema_id_fk , name , seq_start , incr , native_sql , native_key , comments , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MD_SEQUENCES WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.SCHEMA_ID_FK , A.NAME , A.SEQ_START , A.INCR , A.NATIVE_SQL , A.NATIVE_KEY , A.COMMENTS , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , SCHEMA_ID_FK , NAME , SEQ_START , INCR , NATIVE_SQL , NATIVE_KEY , COMMENTS , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MD_SEQUENCES WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
SCHEMA_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MD_SEQUENCES WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
SCHEMA_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
